sentences.en: He could not stand her hectoring moralism.
sentences.cn: 他无法忍受她居高临下的说教.

sentences.en: His moralism is all-encompassing and as passionate as can be. He plans to replace state welfare provision with faith-based charitable organisations that would impose Christian family values.
sentences.cn: 他的道德说教可谓包罗万象,激情澎湃.他计划创建以信仰为基础的慈善机构来代替国家福利事业,以滋养基督家庭的社会价值观.

sentences.en: The rise of moralism was a bugbear to Lord Byron , born in 1788.
sentences.cn: 道德主义的盛行对拜伦来说无疑是一场灾难.

sentences.en: Thirdly, the metaphoric language means the counteraction of moralism.
sentences.cn: 第三, 这种比喻性语言意味着对道德丰义的反拨.
